body:
Typo causes a TypeError to be thown whenever a specified compiler doesn't exist for the arch.

```
...
 File "/autofs/nccs-svm1_home2/wyn/spack-titan/lib/spack/spack/concretize.py", line 498, in __init__
    "No available compiler version matches '%s' on operating_system %s" % compiler_spec, operating_system,  # NOQA: ignore=E501
TypeError: not enough arguments for format string
```
title: Typo in UnavailableCompilerVersionError()
